definition: lit. dazzling with paper and gold (idiom); fig. indulging in a life of luxury

gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: It is often said that Hollywood is  high school with money.

sentences.english: Immersed in this colourful life, meditation is still my daily work.

sentences.english: But there was a dark side to this world of gold and luxurious living.

sentences.english: Chic flash abidjan has become the siren of west africa.
